artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Tsutaya Kichizō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 香蝶楼國貞画 {Kōchōrō Kunisada ga}
text: Center panel of triptych: P.75.51.200 (R), P.75.51.199 (C), P.75.51.198 (L). This triptych represents the scene of "dohyō-iri" ceremony, this wrestler is the "yokozuna".
title: Wrestler Shiranui Dakuemon from Higo Province
